description.english: Purchase all the sticker packs from Cenna's shop
description.german: Kaufe alle Sticker-Packs aus Cennas Laden
description.french: Achetez tous les packs d'autocollants dans la boutique de Cenna
description.koreana: 세나의 가게에서 모든 스티커 팩을 구입하세요
description.spanish: Compra todos los paquetes de pegatinas en la tienda de Cenna
description.schinese: 从森娜的商店购买所有贴纸包
description.tchinese: 從森娜的商店購買所有貼紙包
description.russian: Купи все наборы наклеек в магазине Ценны
description.japanese: セナの店ですべてのステッカーパックを購入する

description.german: Bring die Magie nach Glasden zurück
description.japanese: グラスデンに魔法を取り戻す

description.english: Collect one of at least every historical find
description.german: Sammle jedes historische Fundstück wenigstens einmal
description.french: Récupérez au moins un exemplaire de chaque trouvaille historique
description.koreana: 모든 역사적 발견물 중 하나씩 모으세요
description.spanish: Consigue al menos uno de cada hallazgo histórico
description.schinese: 收集至少每件历史发现中的1种
description.tchinese: 收集至少每件歷史發現中的1種
description.japanese: 歴史的な発見物を少なくとも1つ集める
description.brazilian: Colete pelo menos um de cada achado histórico

description.english: Collect one of at least every modern find
description.german: Sammle jedes moderne Fundstück wenigstens einmal
description.french: Récupérez au moins un exemplaire de chaque trouvaille moderne
description.koreana: 모든 현대적 발견물 중 하나씩 모으세요
description.spanish: Consigue al menos uno de cada hallazgo moderno
description.schinese: 收集至少每件现代发现中的1种
description.tchinese: 收集至少每件現代發現中的1種
description.japanese: 現代の発見物を少なくとも1つ集める
description.brazilian: Colete pelo menos um de cada achado moderno

description.english: Collect all of the cassette tapes
description.spanish: Consigue todas las cintas de casete
description.japanese: カセットテープをすべて集める

description.english: Get the metal detector, trowel and instant camera

description.french: Obtenez le détecteur de métaux, la truelle et l'appareil photo instantané
description.koreana: 금속 탐지기, 흙손, 즉석 카메라를 획득하세요
description.spanish: Consigue el detector de metales, la paleta y la cámara instantánea
description.schinese: 获得金属探测器、泥铲和拍立得相机
description.tchinese: 獲得金屬探測器、泥鏟和拍立得相機
description.japanese: 金属探知機、こて、インスタントカメラを入手する
description.brazilian: Obtenha o detector de metais, a pá e a câmera instantânea

description.french: Récupérez 300 crédits dans la boutique de Cenna
